title: Build find-dupes.py - duplicate detection
description: Identify exact duplicates (same MD5) and near-duplicates (filename variants like Document (1).docx, backups, etc.)

title: Build manifest.py - file inventory with hashes
description: Generate comprehensive file manifest with path, size, mtime, md5, extension, source for all files in ingest directories
close_reason: manifest.py completed - successfully processed 181,877 files (335GB) from onedrive
